about_the_game:
It's a virtual hangout game that aims to bring you together with your friends and have a good time. This platform promises to give you unforgettable moments by combining the fun competition of board games, the excitement of arcade-style racing and the different experiences offered by various games and entertainment.

It not only offers players a fun time, but also the opportunity to make new friends and strengthen existing relationships. Bringing together players locally and globally, this platform strengthens social bonds and enriches the gaming experience with interactive communication features.

Unique features include customizable avatars, group chats, tournaments and community events. These features allow players to express themselves and personalize their gaming experience.

It has become more than just a platform for gamers, it has become a community and a lifestyle. Dive in now to experience unforgettable moments with your friends and embark on new adventures.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 Compatible GPU with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GPU with 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
